Package jrtr.glrenderer

Class GLRenderPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.glrenderer.GLRenderPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderPanel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    simple.SimpleRenderPanel
    public abstract class GLRenderPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderPanel
    Implementats the RenderPanel interface using OpenGL. The interface to OpenGL and the native window system are provided by the LWJGL and GLFW libraries. The class GLRenderContext performs the actual rendering. Note that all OpenGL calls apply to the GLFW window that is created by the current thread. The user needs to extend this class and provide an implementation for the init call-back function.
